ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Stop Welcome Call Automated Emails field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Stop_Welcome_Call_Automated_Emails__c), ( PRIORVALUE(Stop_Welcome_Call_Automated_Emails__c) = True ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Advisor Team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Advisor Team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Rep Team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Rep Team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot uncheck the 'Stop Welcome Call Automated Emails' field.
